alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 15 at 2:03AM MDT until October 15 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures 28 to 32 expected. * WHERE...Mud Lake, INL, Craters of the Moon NM, Idaho Falls, Rexburg, St. Anthony, Pocatello, Blackfoot, American Falls, Shelley, and Fort Hall. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Upper Snake River Plain
